welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.text: I'm a fullstack developer. Check out my profile and projects. I like cooking, drawing and being alchemist.

exp.title: Experience
exp.text: I have been a developer for 7 years. I usually made webs in the HTML4 era when I was younger. I wanted to be an illustrator but it wasn't made for me. Decidí estudiar ingeniería informñatica y al termianr comence haciendo aplicaciones móbiles con Android. Al poco comence con el desarrollo web y me especialicé en el desarrollo front. Mainly I worked in consulting companies developing for medium-large size companies such as Odigeo, inditex and EUIPO/WIPO.
